mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID ) t1 where orgsectorid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`BMLX` = '20' AND t1.`EDITIONSTATE` = '10' AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} OR 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfpersonid}) ) )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`BMLX` = '10' AND t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`ORGSECTORID` = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.datacontext.ormorgid} )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( ( t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} OR instr(t1.levelcode, ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} ) )=1 ) )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srforgid} )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`BMLX` = '20' AND t1.`EDITIONSTATE` = '0' AND t1.`ORGCODE` = #{srf.webcontext.orgcode} AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfpersonid} OR 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfpersonid}) ) )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`XMBLX` = '10' AND t1.`BMLX` = '20' )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN` = '1' AND t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.datacontext.nodeid} )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`BMLX` = '20' AND ( t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srforgid} OR 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfpersonid}) ) )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`BMLX` = '20' )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.datacontext.nodeid} AND t1.`BMLX` = '20' )

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID

SELECT t1.`APPROVALSTATUS`, t1.`BELONGOU`, t1.`BELONGREGION`, t1.`BMBZRS`, t1.`BMLX`, t1.`BMSJBZRS`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DKFS`, t1.`DXMJLYQ`, t1.`DXMZGYQ`, t1.`EDITION`, t1.`EDITIONSTATE`, t11.`ENGINEERINGSCALE`, t1.`ERPORGID`, t1.`GCMCJBM`, t1.`GKJZ`, t1.`GQAP`, t1.`GWSL` AS `GWBZSL`, t1.`GWSL`, t1.`JHCB`, t1.`JHRY`, t1.`KQJSSJ`, t1.`KQKSSJ`, t1.`OLDID`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGCODE`, t1.`ORGID`, t51.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGTYPE`, t1.`ORMXMGLID`, t11.`PROJECT_NAME` AS `ORMXMGLNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t41.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`PORGSECTORID`, t61.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`PRODEPID`, t31.`ORGSECTORNAME` AS `PRODEPNAME`, t1.`PROLEADERID`, t21.`PIMPERSONNAME` AS `PROLEADERNAME`, t1.`QY`, t1.`REFERJOBLEVEL`, t1.`SBSJ`, t1.`SHGWSL`, t1.`SHORTNAME`, t1.`SHZWSL`, t1.`SJRS` AS `SJBZRS`, ( case when t1.`SJRS`>t1.`BMBZRS` then '20' else '' end ) AS `SJBZRS_COLOR`, t1.`SJCB`, t1.`SJRS`, t1.`SJRY`, t1.`STARTSTOPSIGN`, t1.`TITLE`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`VALIDFLAG`, t1.`XBSJ`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHCB`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJCB`,0)) AS `XCCB`, (IFNULL(t1.`JHRY`,0)-IFNULL(t1.`SJRY`,0)) AS `XCRY`, t11.`PROJECT_NUMBER` AS `XMBH`, t1.`XMBLX`, t1.`XMBQ`, t1.`XMGM`, t1.`XMJBQK`, t1.`XMLX`, t1.`XMLXQT`, t1.`ZWSL` AS `ZWBZSL`, t1.`ZWSL`, t51.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_SRFORGSECTOR` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORMXMGL t11 ON t1.ORMXMGLID = t11.ORMXMGLID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t21 ON t1.PROLEADERID = t21.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t31 ON t1.PRODEPID = t31.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t41 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t41.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t51 ON t1.ORGID = t51.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORGSECTOR t61 ON t1.PORGSECTORID = t61.ORGSECTORID WHERE ( t1.`BMLX` = '20' AND t1.`ORGID` = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} )
